# rwhisper

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

rwhisper serves as a client to [OpenAI Whisper](https://github.com/openai/whisper), a general-purpose speech recognition model. 

## Installation

You can install the development version of rwhisper from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("howardbaek/rwhisper")
```
